briefTitle: Intravenous Ascorbic Acid in Women Receiving Adjuvant or Neo-Adjuvant Chemotherapy for Early Stage Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Prospective Double Blind Study of the Effect of Intravenous High Dose Ascorbic Acid in Women Receiving Adjuvant or Neo-Adjuvant Chemotherapy for Early Stage Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Fatigue by self reported fatigue inventory questionnaire
